name: Roommate Bill Management
description:
Create a list of roommates, be able to add bills - for example, biller, amount, due date. Keep track of who has paid. Display what each person has paid, and what they owe. 
Optionally track who is paying on time, and who is late.

name: Personal Trainer
description: This app is for a personal trainer, to keep track of their clients and their progress. Schedule training sessions, keep track of each client's progress. For a mobile version, take photographs of clients as part of tracking their progress. Extension: integrate Google Calendar to create events and send reminders.

name: Car or House Maintenance
description: Make a list of maintenance tasks for a home or car. Tasks will repeat daily, weekly, monthly, seasonally... Keep records of when user has completed tasks. Remind user when a task is due. Extension: integrate Google Calendar to create events and send reminders.

name: Budgeting App
description: Record user's income and expenses. Draw charts or graphs.

name: Book Club (or Movie Club)
description: Organize a group of friends to select a book, schedule a time to meet and discuss the book. Record everyone's opinion of the book. Send reminders about the event. Could also work as a movie-watching club. Extension: intrgrate Google Calendar to create events and send reminders.

name: Road Trip Planner
description: Create a list of places to go. For a mobile version, track where the user has been, and/or use geofencing to detect when user has been to a place on their roadtrip itinerary. Draw maps.

name: Aurora Predictor
description: Use the aurora API (https://services.swpc.noaa.gov/json/planetary_k_index_1m.json)  and weather API to display likelyhood of seeing an aurora in the user's location. High kP and clear skies = better chance. Draw charts of aurora strength.

name: Recipe Book Generator
description: Use recipe APIs to fetch recipes based on a user's search query. Use a library like python-docx or Java's Apache POI to create a neatly-formatted word document with recipes in.

name: Programmer Resources
description: Use Stack Overflow, Reddit, GitHub... APIs to fetch information based on a search query, topic, or error message. Allow user to bookmark useful pages.

name: Meme Collector
description: Use Imgur, Reddit, Giphy, Tumblr...  APIs to fetch images and gifs. User should be abe to download/collect their favourites and organize them into folders. For a mobile version, integrate sharing with friends.

name: Where's the bus?
description: Use Metro Transit's API to track buses, and draw their locations on a map. Be careful not to overload their API.
